unnormalised: Hey, I saw Dr. Rajesh Kumar at AIIMS, Delhi for my migraines. He recommended a CT scan and some meds - Paracetamol 650mg for immediate relief and something else for long-term. Cost me around Rs. 2500 for the consultation and tests. Worth checking him out!
normalised: Hey, I saw Doctor Rajesh Kumar at A-I-I-M-S, Delhi for my migraines. He recommended a C-T scan and some meds - Paracetamol six hundred and fifty milligram for immediate relief and something else for long-term. Cost me around rupee two thousand five hundred for the consultation and tests. Worth checking him out!
